data.title: Foreign Exchange
data.text:
Global reach

As an African bank with global reach, we help clients deal effectively and efficiently across the continent’s foreign currency and money markets. We currently perform over 1.6 million trades per year, with a combined USD1.7 trillion overall turnover.

Access deeper liquidity pools

With an equally strong presence in offshore markets, we can actively engage large institutional investors and corporate accounts. Our dual on-and off-shore positioning as well as our buy- and sell-side ability allows us to access deeper liquidity pools consistently pricing in volume in all market conditions.
